tool_description: Creates Levey-Jennings control charts for visual quality control monitoring with customizable display options and alert zones.

analysis_id.description: Statistical analysis identifier containing control limits

time_range_days.description: Number of days to display on chart (7-90)

point_size.description: Size of data points on chart (1-10)

error_messages: Invalid analysis ID: The specified analysis_id does not exist or is invalid.
Invalid time range: time_range_days must be between 7 and 90.
Invalid control limits: control_limits_display must contain valid values from [1SD, 2SD, 3SD, mean].
Chart generation failed: Unable to create chart due to insufficient data or formatting errors.
Invalid point size: point_size must be between 1 and 10.
usage: Provide statistical analysis ID and chart parameters. The tool generates professional Levey-Jennings control charts for quality monitoring and documentation.

chart_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated chart

chart_url.description: URL or path to the generated chart image

data_points_plotted.description: Number of QC data points plotted on chart

violations_highlighted.description: Number of control rule violations marked on chart
